Been playing cs off and on since i was 13, im 30 now and still play when i get the chance still  the best competitive shooter ever made.

If you start playing this game then you will start spending money on this game
and if you spend money on this game then you don't have any money to buy food 
and if you don't have food then you're gonna starve and if you're gonna starve then your gonna die.
So all of that said .... I think you should play this game.
